https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zLQBTNmyqjgDa6nSYUKAwAuLVhw.jpg Arcade Fire’s first feature film is called 'The Reflektor Tapes'. The project is “a unique cinematic experience, meeting at the crossroads of documentary, music, art and personal history.” Arcade Fire - The Reflektor Tapes
